title: Behold Esports LF Coach
body:
As the title suggests our org is currently searching for a coach or multiple. These positions currently don’t offer monetary benefits but are more a gateway to gain experience in coaching teams of all skills as they participate in amateur tournaments. 

We currently have three teams:
1st - Diamond+
2nd - Plats
3rd - Golds

Happy to have a coach for each team or one to do multiple. As with this role as time goes on and you gain experience and value to the team there will be a time in which a discussion will be held regarding pay to which both parties agree.

Please feel free to add me on Discord to discuss any further- LiLWilly#4179

Open to any questions regarding the positions, don’t hesitate to ask.
